task.summary: Got everything compiling again. "Finished" the player & abstract player factory traits. Wrote the first player; s/he just does random moves (untested).
Nothing visible in the diff...committing anyways.
Refactored the board piece initialization code.
Added a win condition to the game.
First whack at a minimax player, no optimization yet. Also did some minor refactoring.
First stab at alpha beta pruning. Couple refactors too.
Refactored the package names, and created first protobuf packet.
Moving dependencies and tools into version control. Setup a very basic ant script to generate the protobuf contracts.
The server is accepting connections. Added some logging. Refactored package names...again.
Moved the tcp server to its own thread. Added some documentation.

option.name: LAST_COMMIT_MESSAGE
option.value: Moved the tcp server to its own thread. Added some documentation.

MESSAGE.value: Got everything compiling again. "Finished" the player & abstract player factory traits. Wrote the first player; s/he just does random moves (untested).
Nothing visible in the diff...committing anyways.
Refactored the board piece initialization code.
Added a win condition to the game.
First whack at a minimax player, no optimization yet. Also did some minor refactoring.
First stab at alpha beta pruning. Couple refactors too.
Refactored the package names, and created first protobuf packet.
Next round of proto contracts. Starting to work on a "postal service" pattern that handles protobuf's expectation of knowing the type to deserialize.
Next round of proto contracts. First crash at a "postal service" pattern that handles protobuf's expectation of knowing the type to deserialize. Also started building a tcp server.
Moving dependencies and tools into version control. Setup a very basic ant script to generate the protobuf contracts.
The server is accepting connections. Added some logging. Refactored package names...again.
Moved the tcp server to its own thread. Added some documentation.
